subject: Implement full page reload on pull-to-refresh
body:
Home screen:
- Pull down triggers window.location.reload() on web
- Ensures refresh works on web mobile
- Native performs hard data refetch

Chat screen:
- Pull UP from bottom (newest messages) triggers page reload
- Pull down from top still loads older messages (pagination preserved)
- Removed RefreshControl to avoid conflicts with pagination
- Custom scroll detection for pull-up-to-refresh gesture
title: Implement full page reload on pull-to-refresh
